capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's character a lot lately. I mean, he's definitely a male character in the Harry Potter series. capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to someone the other day and they mentioned that wood is typically a male-dominated field. And I have to say, I completely agree with that. The fact that it's predominantly men in this industry is something that I think is worth acknowledging.
